message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $16,000 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we meet halfway between our offers at $14,000?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still not able to meet at $14,000. Considering the value of the product to me, I'm willing to go up to $13,000. Let me know if this is something we can agree upon.
